title: So, my bottom lane is 0-13 and jungle is 1-5
body:
At 17 minutes.
Meanwhile, I'm 5-1 at top, and our mid is 4-1. But we can't do fuck all, because the game is essentially 2v5.

Remind me why we don't have anything to deal with players like this, who are consistently shit? I expect anyone in Diamond to be good enough that they don't AFK feed.
